title: Babel plugin for React components in HyperScript syntax
author: roman01la
content: readme.md babel-plugin-react-hyperscripthyperscript syntax react components without runtime overhead.compiles react-hyperscript react.createelement.exampleinputh('h1#boom.whatever.foo', [ h('span'), h(mycomponent, { text: 'hello!' })]);outputreact.createelement('h1', { id: 'boom', classname: 'whatever foo'},react.createelement('span'),react.createelement(mycomponent, { text: 'hello!' }));installationnpm babel-plugin-react-hyperscriptplugin optionspragma default calls h be replaced react.createelement, you override with custom pragma (including h itself used preact).{ "plugins": ["react-hyperscript", { "pragma": "yo" }]}// inputh('h1#boom.whatever.foo', [ h('span'), h(mycomponent, { text: 'hello!' })]);// outputyo('h1', { id: 'boom', classname: 'whatever foo'},yo('span'),yo(mycomponent, { text: 'hello!' }));usagevia .babelrc (recommended).babelrc{ "plugins": ["react-hyperscript"]}via clibabel --plugins react-hyperscript script.jsvia node apirequire("babel-core").transform("code", { plugins: ["react-hyperscript"]});licensemit
